com.radirius.mercury.audio

Class Audio

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radirius.mercury.audio.Audio
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Resource, Cloneable

    public class Audio
extends Object
implements Resource
    An object for loading and using sounds.
    Author:
    wessles, Jeviny

      • Audio

        protected Audio(int source,
     int buffer)
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • getAudio

        public static Audio getAudio(int buffer)
        Makes a source based off of buffer, and then makes an Audio based off of the source.
        Parameters:
        buffer - The integer index of the sound for OpenAL to process. Returns the audio file.

      • getAudio

        public static Audio getAudio(InputStream is,
             String format)
        Makes a source based off of buffer, and then makes an Audio based off of the source.
        Parameters:
        is - The input file to be read.
        format - The format of the audio file ("wav", "ogg"...). Returns the audio file.

      • getOGGBuffer

        public static int getOGGBuffer(InputStream is)
        Forms a buffer from is.
        Parameters:
        is - The stream to the sound file. Returns The integer index for OpenAL based off of the .ogg file at the InputStream is.

      • getWAVBuffer

        public static int getWAVBuffer(InputStream is)
        Forms a buffer from is.
        Parameters:
        is - The stream to the sound file. Returns The integer index for OpenAL based off of the .wav file at the InputStream is.

      • isPlaying

        public boolean isPlaying()
        Returns Whether or not the clip is playing.

      • play

        public Audio play()
        Plays the clip. If it is already playing, it will restart. If the clip is paused, it will continue.

        Returns the audio file.

      • togglePause

        public Audio togglePause()
        Plays the clip if it is paused, pauses it if it is not paused.

        Returns the audio file.

      • toggleStop

        public Audio toggleStop()
        Plays the clip if it is stopped, stops it if it is not stopped.

        Returns the audio file.

      • isPaused

        public boolean isPaused()
        Returns Whether or not the clip is paused.

      • pause

        public Audio pause()
        Pauses the clip. Reversible by play().

        Returns the audio file.

      • isStopped

        public boolean isStopped()
        Returns Whether or not the clip is stopped.

      • stop

        public Audio stop()
        Stops the clip.

        Returns the audio file.

      • getVolume

        public float getVolume()
        Returns The volume of the clip.

      • setVolume

        public Audio setVolume(float vol)
        Sets the volume of the clip.
        Parameters:
        vol - A floating point volume value, 0.8 being 80%, 1.5 being 150%, etc. Returns the audio file.

      • getPitch

        public float getPitch()
        Returns The pitch of the clip.

      • setPitch

        public Audio setPitch(float pit)
        Sets the pitch of the clip.
        Parameters:
        pit - A floating point pitch value, 0.8 being 80%, 1.5 being 150%, etc. Returns the audio file.

      • isLooping

        public boolean isLooping()
        Returns Whether or not the clip is looping.

      • setLooping

        public Audio setLooping(boolean loop)
        Sets whether or not the clip should loop.
        Parameters:
        loop - Whether or not the clip should loop. Returns the audio file.

      • duplicate

        public Audio duplicate()
        Returns a seperate audio object of the same buffer.

        Description copied from interface: Resource
